items.sentence: Tom didn\'t like Mary and she didn\'t like him.
Tom can\'t leave work today until six o\'clock.
Do you really think Tom is going to believe me?
Tom would like to know what\'s going to happen.
Tom wouldn\'t have left without saying goodbye.
I\'m sure Tom wouldn\'t want you to catch cold.
I\'m sure you understand why we can\'t do that.
I can\'t understand why Tom refused to help us.
Tom thinks Mary will never come back to Boston.
The President isn\'t willing to tell the truth.
